topics.body:
For those interested here's a interesting game:

Unturned now has Mac and Linux support; as well as a workshop.

What is Unturned?  Imagine if you combined Minecraft with Dayz and made it to where the developer actually cared about the performance of the game and didn't just run off with all the money.


Unturned is free, but if you want to support him you can donate $5 on the steam page.  The $5 thing doesn't do anything cause all of the game is completely free; it's just in case you like it.



Tl:dr; Unturned is free, has workshop support and available on all operating systems and can run on a toaster.
